meanings.definition: A level space on which artillery is mounted.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers positioned the cannons on the terrepleins for defense.
meanings.sent2: The fortress had sturdy terrepleins where the artillery was strategically placed.
meanings.sent3: The artillery pieces had a party on the terrepleins, enjoying the view.
meanings.sent4: The terrepleins stood like silent guardians, holding the artillery ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: The terrepleins were like giant shelves, holding the artillery in place.

meanings.definition: A platform or embankment of earth for a road or railroad.
meanings.sent1: The construction workers built the terrepleins to support the new road.
meanings.sent2: The train tracks were laid on sturdy terrepleins to ensure stability.
meanings.sent3: The rabbits made a cozy home under the terrepleins of the road embankment.
meanings.sent4: The terrepleins stretched out like a long, winding path for the railroad.
meanings.sent5: The earthy smell of the terrepleins reminded her of the countryside.
